entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: `IAttributeOperation.AttributedSymbol` #65735
  • While "Rename symbol’s file" is enabled, renaming class fails when using `TargetFrameworks` with at least two target frameworks #65731
  • Decimal default parameter value is not propagated to the synthesized delegate #65728
  • add "inline method" refactoring for async methods in C# #65721
  • Document outline should do shorter qualification for explicit interface methods #65714
  • Document outline should distinguish members with multiple overloads #65713

Closed

  • Inline diagnostics in the editor do not get cleared up #65503
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33201.295 #65718

PullRequests

Created

  • Move classification tests to new framework #65734
    Area-IDE
  • Results of running new "use nameof for nullable attributes" analyzer/fixer on roslyn #65733
    Area-IDE
  • Fix potential race where we're expecting a moniker to be attached #65732
    Area-IDE
  • Create DkmCustomUIVisualizerInfo instances with ExtensionPartId field #65730
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Add fixer to offer to use `nameof(parameter)` in attributes now that the language allows that. #65729
    Area-IDE
  • Fix stale inline diagnostics (#65571) #65727
    Area-IDE
  • Unskip quick info tests #65725
    Area-IDE
  • Move to more consistent patterns in the parser. #65724
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanup unused generated code #65723
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement parsing changes for Primary Constructors feature #65720
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • WIP: Always cache our lazy values. #65719
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify WeaklyCachedRecoverableValueSource #65717
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Move CSharpTyping test to new framework #65726
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65711
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Introduce simpler pattern for managing reset points in the parser. #65702
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • editorconfig UI accessibility bugs #65712
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Delete unnecessary code that was for recoverable trees #65716
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused constructor #65715
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix stale inline diagnostics #65571
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Turn on NRT for the parser. #65706
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Switch to having the IFileChangeWatcher return IDisposable tokens #65709
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Switch from HostWorkspaceServices to SolutionServices #65705
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Move to using ToListAndFree in more places in the parser. #65708
    Area-Compilers
  • Move IDS_FeatureRefLocalsReturns out of the parser #65710
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement a new brokered service for passing project information #65592
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65699
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • log data for analyzers/codefixes/refactorings #65158
    Area-IDE
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Disable flakey integration tests" #62542
    Area-IDE
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #65606
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #65642
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix wrong symbol comparisons #65430
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Allow optional and `params` parameters in synthesized delegate templates #65582
    Area-Compilers
  • Consider delegate default parameter values and `params` in symbol matcher #65579
    Area-Compilers
  • Update CSharpErrorFactsGenerator to be a source generator #65192
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Avoid reporting ref safety errors for discard assignments #65693
    Area-Compilers
